comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when add an embedded SVG image and it is OK after reopen eclipse.

Build number:
2.3.0.v20071114-1532

Steps to reproduce:
1. In a new work space new a report and new an embedded image, select an SVG 
   image.
2. Close eclipse and reopen, double click the image to edit and reselect the 
   previous SVG image.

Expected result:
No exception in both step 1 and 2.

Actual result:
1. Exception is thrown out in step 1.
2. No Exception in Step 2

Error log:
